column1: Nutritional values per ½ Deluxe Tub

> 🌿 **Vegan & Dairy-free**
Recipe is using only soy milk and protein. Since there are no extra thickeners, the base is relatively fluid. It also leads to a rather watery melt, 1g of CMC or another stabilizer will prevent that. Process on *Sorbet*, [hold it shortly under running water](https://jhermann.github.io/ice-creamery/info/tips%2Btricks/#handling-of-icy-sides-bottom) *after* that. Then a scrape-down with compaction, and a respin. Rating: 😋🍌 (untested)

1. In an empty tub, blend the hemp hearts, banana, and squafaba to a smooth puree.
 1. Then add all the other ‘wet’ ingredients.
1. Before freezing, let it rest in the fridge for at least 2 hours.
The [brand names] used are in brackets.
